environments.hardware_abstraction module

Hardware abstraction layer for dual environment setup.

This module provides automatic device detection and selection, MPS vs CPU backend selection logic, and SDR hardware detection with simulation fallback.

class environments.hardware_abstraction.DeviceType(*values)[source]

Bases: Enum

MPS = 'mps'

class environments.hardware_abstraction.HardwareAbstraction(force_device: str | None = None, force_simulation: bool = False, config: SystemConfig = None)[source]

Bases: object

Hardware abstraction layer for cross-platform compatibility with configuration management.

Provides automatic device selection, hardware detection, and simulation fallback for both compute devices and SDR hardware.

__init__(force_device: str | None = None, force_simulation: bool = False, config: SystemConfig = None)[source]

Initialize hardware abstraction layer.

Parameters:

  • force_device – Force specific device type (‘cpu’, ‘mps’, ‘cuda’)

  • force_simulation – Force simulation mode for SDR

  • config – System configuration object
